formattedAddress: 220 East 60th Street Store#2, New York, NY 10022, USA
adrFormatAddress: 220 East 60th Street Store#2, New York, NY 10022, USA

originalText.text: If you live in Manhattan, Midtown East or even beyond, I highly recommend visiting Sam at Tiktok cleaners for all of your tailoring needs. Sam did an incredible job tailoring a champagne pleated gown I am wearing for a wedding in September. I came in on 8/6 and asked for it to be ready by early September, and to my amazement it was beautifully completed 3 days later! His attention to detail is unmatched and kindness is boundless. Sam is an artist and takes such good care of his clients and their garments. 10/10 recommend!

originalText.text: I had the best experience with Sam! He is friendly and extremely diligent in his work. Sam doesn’t use chemicals, yet the clothes came back very nice and clean. Sam even fixed a button in our coat and loose thread in our sweater, FOR FREE. I highly recommend TikTok!

text.text: I had the best experience with Sam! He is friendly and extremely diligent in his work. Sam doesn’t use chemicals, yet the clothes came back very nice and clean. Sam even fixed a button in our coat and loose thread in our sweater, FOR FREE. I highly recommend TikTok!

originalText.text: Excellent dry cleaning results at reasonable prices. He’s removed oily salad dressing stains off of a color-sensitive cotton dress, repaired a fallen dress hem, and done standard dry cleaning of linen pants for me - all well. You’ll be pleased you chose TikTok Cleaners!

text.text: Excellent dry cleaning results at reasonable prices. He’s removed oily salad dressing stains off of a color-sensitive cotton dress, repaired a fallen dress hem, and done standard dry cleaning of linen pants for me - all well. You’ll be pleased you chose TikTok Cleaners!

originalText.text: I literally have never written an online review before, but I felt inclined to do so after the amazing service I received! The owner, Sam, is truly a gem of a person and tailor - I decided on a last minute dress option for my best friend’s semi-formal wedding this weekend and showed up randomly late Monday afternoon asking if he can make a gown that was absurdly long on me into a midi dress. I am leaving for the wedding on Thursday, so we agreed on a pick up of Wednesday night - less than 24 hours later (midday Tuesday), I received a call from him saying the dress was ready, but he wanted to see it on me, because he had a feeling a revision was needed due to a manufacturing issue. The amount of time and precision this man put into perfecting the length of the dress that afternoon due to the manufacturing problem was actually incredible to witness - I picked up the dress today (Wednesday), the dress was pressed perfectly and looked beautiful! His workmanship and care of garments is beyond apparent. He shared stories of all the luxury clothing work he’s done for so many years and showed me other pieces he was working on. He is a total gentlemen and I would trust him with tailoring & dry cleaning any of my clothing. I’m so happy he opened up shop on E 60th Street and I’m excited to visit him again!

originalText.text: My husband and I recently tried this new dry cleaners in our area and I can only say how lucky we are!  This dry cleaner not only provides service seven days a week, they also do an excellent job.  My husband is back to wearing suits almost everyday for work and our daughter has uniforms which need to be cleaned and pressed and so far I can only say that their work is fantastic.  The proprietor Sam is so pleasant and friendly that there is no reason for us to go anywhere else.
